art.author: barbara
art.post: I haven’t read the book and don’t intend to because one ‘fact’ that Colton shared on TV about his experience was that God had really big wings. Sorry. God is a Spirit, and only the angels have wings. If he’s wrong on just this one point, then his entire account is suspect.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
